title: It’s Never Too Late to Start Over
description:
How to be open to new possibilities; and Instagram sensation Steve Greig, the animal-loving man behind the senior dog adoption account @Wolfgang2242, talks to us about finding his purpose after the loss of his beloved dog, Wolfgang.

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

From this episode:

@wolfgang2242

Pre-order “The One and Only Wolfgang” by Steve Greig
